mapper.select: SELECT PATIENTS_NAME, PATIENTS_NO, AGE, ADHD, MO, RECEIPT_DATE FROM (SELECT PATIENTS_NO, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') - SUBSTR((CASE WHEN SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 8, 1) IN ('1', '2') THEN '19' || SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 1, 6) WHEN SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 8, 1) IN ('3', '4') THEN '20' || SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 1, 6) END), 1, 4) + 1 AS AGE, PATIENTS_NAME, ADHD, MO FROM TB_PATIENTS) JOIN TB_JS USING(PATIENTS_NO) WHERE CLINIC_STATE=0 AND RECEIPT_DATE=#{receiptDate}

SELECT PATIENTS_NAME, PATIENTS_NO, AGE, ADHD, MO, RECEIPT_DATE, CHART_NO FROM (SELECT PATIENTS_NO, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') - SUBSTR((CASE WHEN SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 8, 1) IN ('1', '2') THEN '19' || SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 1, 6) WHEN SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 8, 1) IN ('3', '4') THEN '20' || SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 1, 6) END), 1, 4) + 1 AS AGE, PATIENTS_NAME, ADHD, MO FROM TB_PATIENTS) JOIN TB_JS USING(PATIENTS_NO) WHERE CLINIC_STATE=1 AND RECEIPT_DATE=#{receiptDate}

SELECT CHART_NO, PATIENTS_NAME, INSURANCE, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 8, 1) IN ('1', '3') THEN '남' WHEN SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 8, 1) IN ('2', '4') THEN '여' END AS GENDER, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') - SUBSTR((CASE WHEN SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 8, 1) IN ('1', '2') THEN '19' || SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 1, 6) WHEN SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 8, 1) IN ('3', '4') THEN '20' || SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 1, 6) END), 1, 4) + 1 AS AGE, RECEIPT_DATE FROM TB_JS JOIN TB_PATIENTS USING(PATIENTS_NO) WHERE PATIENTS_NO=#{patientsNo}

SELECT PATIENTS_NO, CHART_NO, PATIENTS_NAME, PATIENTS_PNO, INSURANCE, ADHD, MO, RECEIPT_DATE FROM TB_JS JOIN TB_PATIENTS USING(PATIENTS_NO) WHERE RECEIPT_DATE=#{receiptDate} AND CLINIC_STATE=2 ORDER BY RECEIPT_DATE

SELECT PATIENTS_NO, CHART_NO, PATIENTS_NAME, PATIENTS_PNO, INSURANCE, ADHD, MO, RECEIPT_DATE FROM TB_JS JOIN TB_PATIENTS USING(PATIENTS_NO) WHERE RECEIPT_DATE BETWEEN #{startDay} AND #{endDay} AND CLINIC_STATE=2 ORDER BY RECEIPT_DATE

SELECT PATIENTS_NO, CHART_NO, PATIENTS_NAME, PATIENTS_PNO, INSURANCE, ADHD, MO, RECEIPT_DATE FROM TB_JS JOIN TB_PATIENTS USING(PATIENTS_NO) WHERE RECEIPT_DATE BETWEEN #{startDay} AND #{endDay} AND CLINIC_STATE=2 ORDER BY PATIENTS_NO

SELECT PATIENTS_NO, CHART_NO, PATIENTS_NAME, PATIENTS_PNO, INSURANCE, ADHD, MO, RECEIPT_DATE FROM TB_JS JOIN TB_PATIENTS USING(PATIENTS_NO) WHERE RECEIPT_DATE BETWEEN #{startDay} AND #{endDay} AND CLINIC_STATE=2 ORDER BY PATIENTS_NAME

SELECT PATIENTS_NO, CHART_NO, PATIENTS_NAME, PATIENTS_PNO, INSURANCE, ADHD, MO, RECEIPT_DATE, SUBSTR(PATIENTS_PNO, 1, 6) AS PNO FROM TB_JS JOIN TB_PATIENTS USING(PATIENTS_NO) WHERE RECEIPT_DATE BETWEEN #{startDay} AND #{endDay} AND CLINIC_STATE=2 ORDER BY PNO
